changeSet.author: KFSTEM
changeSet.comment: Update parameters to allow the Travel and Entertainment Module payment documents to have banks associated.

update.where: NMSPC_CD='KFS-SYS' AND CMPNT_CD = 'Bank' AND PARM_NM='BANK_CODE_DOCUMENT_TYPES' AND APPL_ID = 'KFS'
NMSPC_CD='KFS-SYS' AND CMPNT_CD = 'Bank' AND PARM_NM='DEFAULT_BANK_BY_DOCUMENT_TYPE' AND APPL_ID = 'KFS'

column.name: NM
column.value: Travel/Entertainment Module

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Specifies the card types used in the Imported Tab where the expense is always reimbursable (for example, CTS card).

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The campus travel email address from which the notification is sent

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The cumulative amount for reimbursement without division approval

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the Imported Expense Detail section of the Imported Expense tab is disabled.

column.name: VAL
column.value: I certify the statements herein are true and just in all respects; that payment of the amounts claimed has not and will not be reimbursed to me from any other sources; that travel performed for which reimbursement is claimed was performed by me on State business and that no claims are included for expense of a personal or political nature or for any other expense not authorized by the State of Colorado Fiscal Rules; and that I actually incurred or paid the operating expenses of the motor vehicles for which reimbursement is claimed.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The statement displayed in the Employee Certification tab of the Travel Reimbursement document when the Traveler Type is "Employee"

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The traveler type code(s) that represents an employee.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", Due Corporate Card Total line is displayed in the Total tab.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y" and the corporate credit card transactions are included in the imported expense, a PDP payment group is created to pay the corporate credit card company when the document becomes final.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value associated with each category is "Y", the per diem category will be displayed. Format will be LODGING=Y;MILEAGE=Y;PER_DIEM=Y. If the flag is all "N", the Trip Details Estimate Tab/Per Diem section will not be displayed.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", then the incidentals are added to the Per Diem when there is at least one meal (breakfast, lunch or dinner) claimed. If "N", then the incidentals will be added regardless.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The trip type code(s) representing international travel.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The statement displayed in the Employee Certification tab of the Travel Reimbursement document when the Traveler Type is "Non-Employee" as defined in parameter KFS-TEM / Document / NON_EMPLOYEE_TRAVELER_TYPES.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The traveler type code(s) that represents a non-employee.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Parameter to determine whether a Travel Document is considered delinquent and the appropriate action for it. W=Warning; S=Stop. With a warning the document can continue through; Stop does not allow the initiator to continue.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", send notifications when the travel document workflow statuses change, if the traveler has indicated notifications should be sent via their profile.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Defines the quarter time table for a day. The format is quarter=ending time in the military format.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: F-Traveler and Fiscal Officer cannot be the same;D-Traveler and Division Approver cannot be the same

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The Travel Authorization document type codes for which email notifications will be sent when the Travel Authorization changes route statuses.

column.name: VAL
column.value: Attach receipts to the coversheet and mail to the Travel Office.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Instructions that will print on the Coversheet.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The documentation location code used by payments on the Travel Authorization, Travel Authorization Amendment, Travel Reimbursement, Entertainment, and Moving & Relocation documents. If a document specific parameter with the same name is created (for example, KFS-TEM / TravelAuthorization / DOCUMENTATION_LOCATION_CODE), the documentation location code for Travel Authorization documents will default to that instead.

column.name: VAL
column.value: Travel Authorization Status Change

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email notification subject when a Travel Authorization (TA) document status changed

column.name: VAL
column.value: Travel Authorization Final

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email notification subject when a Travel Authorization (TA) document status final

column.name: VAL
column.value: Expense Report Status Change

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email notification subject when Travel Entertainment (TR), Entertainment (ENT), Relocation (RELO) documents statuses have changed.

column.name: VAL
column.value: Expense Report Final

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email notification subject when Travel Entertainment (TR), Entertainment (ENT), Relocation (RELO) document statuses are final

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: the non-travel authorization document type codes qualified for on change notification.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Travel import instructions URL.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Payment Reason Code used to populate the Disbursement Voucher when making travel vendor payments.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the user may override the primary destination returned from the table, or, enter the value as a free form text.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Card types that are allowed for advances.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the TA document creates INV documents to establish receivables and customers are created.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Determines whether to show a warning on cash advances.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicates whether or not emergency contact information should be displayed on the Travel Authorization.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", per diem sites from the DV Per Diem Table will be displayed when entering the primary destination.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the per diem amount field is editable and the initiator may lower the per diem amount. Otherwise, per diems will not be editable and will be display as one amount in Meals And Incidentals.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the Vendor Payment link becomes available in the TA custom search prior to TA approval.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Percentage of Per Diem allowed on the first and last day of travel.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the new fiscal year encumbrances will be held and will be released by the "temReleaseHeldEncumbranceJob" job.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", multiple cash advances will be allowed for Travel Authorization Amendment (TAA) documents.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The number of days to add to current date to derive the AR receivable due date when an Invoice is created.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Customer Type Code used when creating a customer.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Link to the travel advance policy

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Billing Chart used when creating an invoice to record travel advances.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Billing Organization used when creating an invoice to record travel advances.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Invoice Item Code used when creating an invoice to record the travel advance.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Account Number from which the travel advance payment should be paid.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Chart of Account Code from which the travel advance payment should be paid.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Object Code from which the travel advance payment should be paid.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter is "Y", display the "Less Advances for this Trip" in the Travel Expense Total section.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter is "Y", display the Encumbrance Total field.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter is "Y", display the accounting distribution tab (summary of expense by object code). When the parameter is "N", only the normal Accounting Lines are displayed.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the low risk travel reimbursements are approved with Fiscal Officer and Organization approvals.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the per diem amount fields are editable and the initiator may lower the per diem amount. Otherwise, per diems will be displayed as selectable checkboxes.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the Third Party Vendor payment button displays before the Travel Reimbursement is fully approved.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The object code assigned to reimburse lodging. In the format Traveler Type Code=Trip Type Code=Object Code (EMP=IN=6100).

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Lodging Expense Type Codes, used in determining how to report lodging expenses when generating reports.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The object code assigned to reimburse per diem. In the format Traveler Type Code=Trip Type Code=Object Code (EMP=IN=6100).

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The reimbursement percentage over encumbrance amount which triggers additional routing.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the Travel Authorization (TA) estimate amount will be displayed in the Travel Reimbursement (TR) Expense Summary Report for comparison purposes.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Specifies barcode style. Choices are 39 (Code39) and 128 (Code128).

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The fax number printed on the Fax Coversheet and all of the barcode forms.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Expense Type Codes used for Transportation. This is used when generating reports to determine how to report transporation expenses.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When the DISPLAY_ACCOUNTING_DISTRIBUTION_TAB_IND parameter equals "N" then the object codes are validated against this list of valid object levels.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", display the accounting distribution tab (summary of expense by object code). When the parameter is "N", only the normal Accounting Lines are displayed.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", display the accounting distribution tab (summary of expense by object code). When the parameter is "N", only the normal Accounting Lines are displayed.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Mapping between the AR Customer Type and the TEM Traveler Type. The format is AR Customer Type=Traveler Type.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Mapping between the KIM Affiliation Type and the TEM Traveler Type. The format is KIM Affiliation Type=Traveler Type.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Breaks down the MIE total into breakfast, lunch, and dinner in the event that the matching MEI total is not found in the CONUS MEAL_BREAKDOWN table.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: This parameter populates the specified state with IN in the Per Diem table.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The trip type code for international travel.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The trip type code for in-state travel.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Breaks down the local meals into breakfast, lunch dinner, and incidentals for Outside the Continental United States.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The trip type code for out-state travel.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter is "Y", reject the entire per diem file if an error occurs.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The format of the profile data exported from TEM. The valid VALUES are csv or xml.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Defines the fields within the accounting line for matching between the TA encumbrance accounting line and downloaded agency data. List the accounting line elements that will be used for matching. Valid VALUES are: Account, Sub-Account.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: AP clearing account where the Travel Credit Card payment will be made.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: AP clearing chart code where the Travel Credit Card payment will be made.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: AP clearing object code where the Travel Credit Card payment will be made.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Object Code to distribute airline charges from travel credit cards when the Trip ID is not known.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Object Code to distribute lodging from travel credit cards when the Trip ID is not known.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Object Code to distribute rental car charges from travel credit cards when the Trip ID is not known.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the FYI for the Tax Ramification Notification document is sent to the fiscal officer.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The number of days after the cash advances are due to send the tax ramification notification to the travelers.

column.name: VAL
column.value: Taxable Ramification Notice for

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email notification subject.

column.name: VAL
column.value: The following advance is now past due and you have exceeded the IRS time frame allowable to submit payment/receipts after travel. Since your advance is more than overdue, you are in the process of being considered for payroll deduction. IF YOU HAVE ALREADY SUBMITTED YOUR VOUCHER, PLEASE NOTIFY US. If you traveled for Study Abroad, notify them regarding the status of your voucher. For all others, please confirm with your department's administrator that your voucher/payment was submitted to Voucher Processing. If you feel we should have received your voucher/payment, please contact our office to confirm receipt. PLEASE RESPOND VIA EMAIL. Your immediate attention to this matter is appreciated.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The text which should be sent to the travelers who have outstanding advances over a specified period.

column.name: VAL
column.value: knoreceipt-l@indiana.edu

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email address from which the notification is sent.

column.name: VAL
column.value: Newly Imported Expenses

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email notification subject.

column.name: VAL
column.value: You have newly imported expenses that have been reconciled to your TEM documents.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The text which should be sent to the travelers who have newly imported expenses that have been reconciled.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email address from which the notification is sent from.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: AR customer email notification selection criteria. Syntax is Selection Criteria=Value. Available selection criteria are: CHART, ORG and ACCOUNT.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The notification selection option. Its valid value can be PROCESSING_ORG, BILLING_ORG or ACCOUNT.

column.name: VAL
column.value: Customer Aging Report for

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email notification subject.

column.name: VAL
column.value: The following advance is now past due and you have exceeded the IRS time frame allowable to submit payment/receipts after travel. Since your advance is more than overdue, you are in the process of being considered for payroll deduction. IF YOU HAVE ALREADY SUBMITTED YOUR VOUCHER, PLEASE NOTIFY US. If you traveled for Study Abroad, notify them regarding the status of your voucher. For all others, please confirm with your department's administrator that your voucher/payment was submitted to Voucher Processing. If you feel we should have received your voucher/payment, please contact our office to confirm receipt. PLEASE RESPOND VIA EMAIL. Your immediate attention to this matter is appreciated.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email body.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The email address from which the notification is sent.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The timing of when the aging email notification should be sent. The value should 30, 60, 90 or AGE. When the AGE is entered, it assumes the value of the CUSTOMER_INVOICE_AGE parameter.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Label used for payees with type code C within the Disbursement Voucher.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", display the accounting distribution tab (summary of expense by object code). When the parameter is "N", only the normal Accounting Lines are displayed.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", validate per diem against daily total versus each individual meal and incidental.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Allow the user (arranger) to select their own imported expense for the traveler.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", a pseudo card number is generated.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Credit card code for corporate cards created from a Corporate Card Application (CCAP) document.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Code for CTS cards created from a CTS Card Application (CTAP) document.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the Travel Authorization document will display the related sections for Import Expenses.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter value is "Y", the trip date validation is disabled.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Email address which sends out the notification that a Travel or Entertainment document was prepared for immediate extraction.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Email addresses which receive notification that a Travel or Entertainment document was prepared for immediate extraction.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If true, the traveler type ("EMP" for Employee, "NON" for Non-Employee) will be included as part of generated trip ids.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: List of per diem codes (state_alpha for CONUS records, country_code for OCONUS records) which will be skipped during the load process.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Allowed organization code for loading Travel Document payments to process checks.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: PDP sub-unit code for loading Travel Document payments.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: URL directing users to the site your institution wishes them to use for calculating currency conversions.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The expense type code which will be the default for per diem expenses.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If set to "Y", then on international trips where per diem is requested, information about accommodations must also be provided.

update.where: nmspc_cd = 'KFS-FP' and cmpnt_cd = 'DisbursementVoucher' and parm_nm = 'VALID_PAYEE_TYPES_BY_PAYMENT_REASON' and appl_id = 'KFS'
nmspc_cd = 'KFS-FP' and cmpnt_cd = 'DisbursementVoucher' and parm_nm = 'VALID_OBJECT_LEVELS_BY_PAYMENT_REASON' and appl_id = 'KFS'
nmspc_cd = 'KFS-GL' and cmpnt_cd = 'PosterEntriesStep' and parm_nm = 'ENCUMBRANCE_OPEN_AMOUNT_OVERRIDING_DOCUMENT_TYPES' and appl_id = 'KFS'

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The value in this parameter will display on various AR and TEM reports.

update.where: nmspc_cd = 'KFS-SYS' and cmpnt_cd = 'All' and parm_nm = 'INSTITUTION_NAME' and appl_id = 'KFS'
nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS' and cmpnt_cd = 'All' and parm_nm = 'MAX_FILE_SIZE_DEFAULT_UPLOAD' and appl_id = 'KUALI'
nmspc_cd = 'KFS-AR' and cmpnt_cd = 'CustomerInvoice' and parm_nm = 'GLPE_RECEIVABLE_OFFSET_OBJECT_CODE_BY_SUB_FUND' and appl_id = 'KFS'

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The number of days before trip begin date and after trip end date to determine duplicate trip date range.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Y/N indicator showing if the Travel/Entertainment module is currently unavailable for Online Transaction Processing (OLTP). Y means the module is currently locked and cannot be used. N means the module is unlocked and available for use.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: This parameter identifies an arbitrary "effective to" date that has been assigned to per diem rows when a valid "effective to" date does not exist. When a new year's per diem rates are loaded, if a new row has an "effective to" date matching this parameter then the previous year's row for that destination will have its "effective to" date changed to be one day prior to the new rate's "effective from" date. Date format for this parameter is MM/dd/yyyy.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If set to "Y", the certification for non-employee hosts is required.

column.name: VAL
column.value: You have newly imported expenses that need to be reconciled.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The text which should be sent to the travelers who have newly imported expenses that need to be reconciled.

update.where: nmspc_cd = 'KFS-PURAP' and cmpnt_cd = 'Document' and parm_nm = 'DISTRIBUTION_METHOD_FOR_ACCOUNTING_LINES' and appl_id = 'KFS'
